Text: Re Cooper Alliance Prebuy programI answer this email thought I would confirm with you how we intend collecting and distributing the K rebate for the prebuy program The methanol plant contributed K toward the K goal Thanks Shirley Jo DickensWilson Director Process and Operating Equipment Global Strategic Sourcing Forwarded by Shirley Jo WilsonNAEnron on PM Kerry Roper AM To Shirley Jo NRON cc Subject Re Cooper Alliance Prebuy program How will we recieve this rebate on our books Will it be credited to the same place the charge hits Forwarded by Kerry RoperGPGFINEnron on AM Stephen Busick PM To Kerry NRON cc Subject Re Cooper Alliance Prebuy program Forwarded by Stephen BusickECFEnron on PM Stephen Busick PM To Shirley Jo NRON cc David NRON Subject Re Cooper Alliance Prebuy program Shirley Now that we have discussed it I understand sufficiently to be confident that its good all around for us to participate It will alter our procurement timing a little if we do delay our overhauls to next year we would be buying the long lead high dollar stuff this quarter even if we do delay but it seems clear that it is in Enrons best interest to make those slight changes I will let our controller and Finance Manager know whats up just to keep them informed They may be helpful to us in figuring out how to get the rebate to come into GPG through Enron Methanol Company or Enron Clean Fuels I will admit to very limited knowlege of how those transactions take place I will also let Debbie Hinkle our buyer know to expect your call about prices we have been receiving from Cooper Thanks again Steve Shirley Jo Wilson AM To Stephen NRON cc Lisa NRON Rositza NRON Rick nron Subject Cooper Alliance Prebuy program Steve Per my voice mail today We would like to offer your operation the opportunity to receive rebate on parts purchased from Cooper We have prepaid MM for parts and will receive a rebate Other parts of GPG have used about K of the prebuy and we would like to role your shutdown requirements into the program Please call me as soon as possible and I will answer any questions you have Look forward to talking to you Regards Shirley Jo DickensWilson

Meeting with CES at Massas corner of across from One Allen Center Discuss sale of inventorywith Ed Roper and John Simmons to review the potential inventory sale of engine and compressor parts Lisa Honey will attend in my absences
